title: 111_hr6168
content: DEDUCTION FOR QUALIFIED SMALL BUSINESS INCOME. The deduction for qualified small business income allows for a deduction equal to 9 percent of the lesser of the taxpayer's qualified production activities income or taxable income, and 20 percent for qualified small businesses in 2010 or 2011. The new subsection added to Section 199 of the Code defines a qualified small business as one with 500 or fewer employees on average during the taxable year.
